description:
App for those who suffer from the Memetro disorder Memetro is a type of memory functioning disorder, during which the affected person is unable to remember that according to current regulations on metropolitan transport, they must validate the transport ticket at the entrance to the facilities. The Memetro can be spontaneous, in the case of transient global Memetro (TGM for its acronym in English) it usually lasts a maximum of 75 minutes and in the long run it usually leads to congenital. Memetro also works on Telegram! Alerts can be launched from @ColatBarcelonaBot and follow them on the #MemetroBCN Metro currently has support for the following cities:
    • Barcelona
